attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let us know in due time when our petitions are due for a review NOT reject them then tell us   I have had 3 emails today saying my petitions had been.... one of which was rejected over a month the other 2 were received today and it don`t tell me what they were how can they be revised if you don`t tell me

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
